member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBaseInputAttribute
member.summary: Abstract base class for Dapr input binding attributes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBaseInputAttribute.DaprAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the address of the Dapr runtime endpoint.
member.remarks: If not specified, the default value of http://localhost:{daprPort} is used. If the DAPR_HTTP_PORT environment variable is present, that value is used for {daprPort}. Otherwise port 3500 is assumed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBaseOutputAttribute
member.summary: Abstract base class for Dapr output binding attributes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBaseOutputAttribute.DaprAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the address of the Dapr runtime endpoint.
member.remarks: If not specified, the default value of http://localhost:{daprPort} is used. If the DAPR_HTTP_PORT environment variable is present, that value is used for {daprPort}. Otherwise port 3500 is assumed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBindingOutputAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to specify parameters for the Dapr output bindings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBindingOutputAttribute.BindingName
member.summary: Gets or sets the configured name of the binding.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBindingOutputAttribute.Operation
member.summary: Gets or sets the configured operation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprInvokeOutputAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to specify parameters for the Dapr invoke output binding.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprInvokeOutputAttribute.AppId
member.summary: Gets or sets the dapr app name to invoke.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprInvokeOutputAttribute.MethodName
member.summary: Gets or sets the method name of the app to invoke.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprInvokeOutputAttribute.HttpVerb
member.summary: Gets or sets the http verb of the app to invoke.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprPublishOutputAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to specify parameters for the Dapr publish output binding.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprPublishOutputAttribute.PubSubName
member.summary: Gets or sets the pub/sub name to publish to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprPublishOutputAttribute.Topic
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the topic to publish to.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprSecretInputAttribute
member.summary: Parameter attribute for the Dapr secret input binding.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprSecretInputAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the secret store to get the secret from.
The key identifying the name of the secret to get.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprSecretInputAttribute.SecretStoreName
member.summary: Gets the name of the secret store to get the secret from.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprSecretInputAttribute.Key
member.summary: Gets the key identifying the name of the secret to get.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprSecretInputAttribute.Metadata
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of metadata properties in the form "key1=value1&key2=value2".

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprStateInputAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to specify parameters for the dapr state input binding.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprStateInputAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the state store.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprStateInputAttribute.StateStore
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the state store to retrieve or store state. Is found in the `metadata.name` of the component.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprStateInputAttribute.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key name to get or set state.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprStateOutputAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to specify parameters for the dapr state output binding.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprStateOutputAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the state store.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprStateOutputAttribute.StateStore
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the state store to retrieve or store state. Is found in the `metadata.name` of the component.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprStateOutputAttribute.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key name to get or set state.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBindingTriggerAttribute
member.summary: Trigger attribute used for Dapr actor functions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprBindingTriggerAttribute.BindingName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Dapr trigger.
member.remarks: If not specified, the name of the function is used as the trigger name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprServiceInvocationTriggerAttribute
member.summary: Trigger attribute used for Dapr service invocation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprServiceInvocationTriggerAttribute.MethodName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the method on a remote Dapr App.
member.remarks: If not specified, the name of the function is used as the method name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprTopicTriggerAttribute
member.summary: Trigger attribute used for Dapr pub/sub topics.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprTopicTriggerAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprTopicTriggerAttribute.PubSubName
member.summary: Gets the pub/sub name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprTopicTriggerAttribute.Topic
member.summary: Gets or sets the topic. If unspecified the function name will be used.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker.Extensions.Dapr.DaprTopicTriggerAttribute.Route
member.summary: Gets or sets the route for the trigger. If unspecified the topic name will be used.
